## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                          | Type      | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `aligned` | `aligned` | Makes labels and input elements inline inside groups | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `as`      | `as`      | HTML tag/element for form container                  | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `stacked` | `stacked` | Stack form elements                                  | `boolean` | `undefined` |
